workshop.title: The Workshop
workshop.description: Between runs, you can now visit the Workshop and spend Balance Points to add new items to your deck (until the adventurer retires).

room_deck_size_increase.title: Room Deck Size Increased
room_deck_size_increase.description: The number of rooms in your deck has been increased to 36.

hand_size_increase.title: Hand Size Increased
hand_size_increase.description: You can now hold more cards in your hand, giving you more options.

adventurer_health.title: Adventurer's Health
adventurer_health.body: This is the adventurer's current health. If it reaches zero, the run ends.

adventurer_power.title: Adventurer's Power
adventurer_power.body:
This is the adventurer's power level. It affects how much damage they deal in combat.
  • Higher power is better
  • Can be increased by items

adventurer_flow_state.title: Mindstate
adventurer_flow_state.body:
The adventurer's mental state. This is affected by the difficulty of encounters.

If they get too bored or too anxious, they might quit.

multiple_units.title: Mobs
multiple_units.body: Stats apply to eaxh individual mob in this room.
